# audioSettings

**Instance Property**

The settings used to decode or re-encode audio before it’s output.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioSettings: [String : Any]! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is a dictionary containing values for audio settings keys defined in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/audio-settings].

If the value of this property is `nil`, samples are output in their device native format.

## Configuring audio capture

- **recommendedAudioSettingsForAssetWriter(writingTo:)**: Specifies the recommended settings for use with an `AVAssetWriterInput`.
- **spatialAudioChannelLayoutTag**: The audio channel layout tag of the audio sample buffers produced by the audio data output.
